name: Automaton (itch) (Tasmi Islam, Htmlpro19, natbriceno, EduardoMonroy, ricedawg2222, Jackson Goodall, Zebo616)
name_original: Automaton (itch) (Tasmi Islam, Htmlpro19, natbriceno, EduardoMonroy, ricedawg2222, Jackson Goodall, Zebo616)
description: As night passes and morning comes, you realize your little brother fell victim to an untimely kidnapping by the town’s infamous mad scientist up in the mansion on the hill. Find your way through the treacherous manor, confront terrifying half-human atrocities, defend yourself with traps and tools, and rescue him before he becomes the next failed experiment.
